thread.title: Bella Hadid flashes her nipples in completely see-through dress at masquerade ball with Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid flashes her nipples in completely see-through dress at masquerade ball with Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Bella Hadid flashes her nipples in completely see-through dress at masquerade ball with Kendall Jenner and A$AP Rocky
text:
Bella Hadid is one of the most in-demand supermodels in the world. 
So you can’t blame the stunner for wanting to show off her stunning figure. 
And that’s certainly what the 20 year old did at the Christian Dior masquerade ball in Paris last night. Bella Hadid shows The Weeknd what he's missing (Photo: Getty) 
The Weeknd’s ex-girlfriend went all out for the fancy do wearing a sheer blue gown. 
The bodice featured underwired cups – but although the structured gown held Bella in place, it did little to hide her modesty. 
She wore a pair of white Dior boxer shorts to prevent her lower half from being completely on show. Bella Hadid attended the Christian Dior Haute Couture Spring Summer 2017 masquerade ball in Paris (Photo: Getty) 
Bella was unfazed by the attention as she posed for pictures with her friend Kendall and her rumoured boyfriend A$AP Rocky. 
Just days ago, Bella was spotted going to the gym with her sister Gigi in New York , to help her get over her recent split from musician The Weeknd. 
Meanwhile, it's been reported that Selena doesn't feel guilty about her and The Weeknd's blossoming romance. Kendall Jenner, Bella Hadid and Eva Herzigova pull their best poses (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Bella Hadid with fellow model Chiara Ferragni (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
Acccording to US reports, Selena insists she has no reason to feel bad because she and Bella are merely acquaintances. 
Insiders told TMZ that although they are both part of Taylor Swift's squad, Selena and Bella have never been close and she didn't feel the need to inform her about the new romance. Bella Hadid and her ex The Weeknd at the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show (Photo: Rex Features) 
The pair split after 18 months together, with The Weeknd hooking up with Selena Gomez shortly after. 
The model reportedly feels 'backstabbed' by the Come And Get It singer and her ex-boyfriend's new romance. Like us on Facebook
